title: All My Patients are Under the Bed: Memoirs of a Cat Doctor
description: From Simon & Schuster, All My Patients are Under the Bed is Dr. Louis J. Camuti's memoirs of a cat doctor.In All My Patients are Under the Bed by Dr. Louis J. Camuti relates some of the veterinarian's cases, with observations about his patients and their owners in particular and the mystique of "cat people" in general.
author: Louis J. Camuti
